title: GetPropertyCallbackAttachment (Method)
text:
METHOD GetPropertyCallbackAttachment : CmpBACnet.IEC_BACNET_STATUS
Gets the current callback status of a property of the BACnet-Object. This status defines if
the WRITE- or READ-Callbacks (IEC_BACNET_CALLBACK_TYPE used in
BACnetServer.RegisterCallback
) are called
for the specified property of this object.

rows.Name: ePropertyID
rows.Comment: The id of the property to get its callback status for.

rows.Name: xReadCallbackAttached
rows.Comment:
If the READ-Callback is called for the sepcified property of
this object, TRUE. Else FALSE.

rows:
If the WRITE-Callback is called for the sepcified property
of this object, TRUE. Else FALSE.
